description:
Welcome to the Ogenki Clinic where Dr. Sawaru Ogeguri and Nurse Ruko Tatase are ready to service any sexual problem. Dr. Ogeguri and Nurse Ruko are always willing to go to any length to solve the sexual problems of their patients, even if it requires special sexual aids, or Dr. Ogeguriâ€™s own personal equipment.
Source: R1 VHS
